name: Glaive Rush
effect: Until the user's next turn, all moves used against it succeed even on a failed accuracy throw (except Successive Action moves and One Hit KO moves) and all attacks get 2 Extra Dice on its Damage Rolls. Inflicts Wounds.
description: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. This deals big damage to the target, leaving big gashes. This also leaves the user exposed, though, and a prime target for counterattack.
